alert.note: Alert for Coleman; Concho; Runnels (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 17 at 6:12PM CDT until June 17 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 645 PM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN COLEMAN...EAST CENTRAL TOM GREEN...SOUTHEASTERN RUNNELS AND NORTHERN CONCHO COUNTIES... At 611 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Us- 83 Near The Concho- Runnels County Line, or 8 miles northeast of Paint Rock, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Ivie Reservoir Near Concho Park Marina around 620 PM CDT. Leaday around 625 PM CDT. Talpa around 635 PM CDT. Voss around 640 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include The Intersection Of Ranch Road 1929 And Ranch Road 2134, Us- 83 Near The Concho-Runnels County Line, The Intersection Of Us- 83 And Ranch Road 1929 and The Intersection Of Ranch Road 380 And Ranch Road 381. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
